subject: World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Host New Zealand beat France, 37-17, on Saturday in the Rugby World Cup to take control of its group, while England moved clear in its group by routing Romania, 67-3.
snippet: Host New Zealand beat France, 37-17, on Saturday in the Rugby World Cup to take control of its group, while England moved clear in its group by routing Romania, 67-3.
